entry.title: Nvidia Under Fire: SEC Supports Supreme Court Crypto-Related Class-Action Lawsuit
entry.summary:
The US is entering the fray as it backs a class-action lawsuit against tech giant and graphics processing units manufacturer, Nvidia Corp. The Department of Justice and Securities and Exchange Commission are appealing to the Supreme Court to revive a case that accuses Nvidia Corp. of misleading investors about its revenue from cryptocurrency mining. This litigation has been on a rollercoaster ride since it was filed in 2018 and is back on the agenda.
Government Support For Investors
In an amicus brief that was filed October 2, Solicitor General Elizabeth Prelogar and SEC senior lawyer Theodore Weiman argued that the case has sufficient facts to resurrect the course of action. entry.summary: Republican Majority Whip Tom Emmer sat down with Decrypt‚Äôs Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano to discuss the state of crypto legislation, Kamala Harris, Fairshake, and more at Messari Mainnet 2024.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 209 - LET UPTOBER BEGIN!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see inflows for 8 straight days. SUI enters top 20, $110m of unlocks today. SOL weekly DEX volume flips ETH. Firedancer sees very fast TPS on Testnet. ETH gas up 500% in 2 weeks. EIGEN opens at $7bn FDV. FTX creditors vote in favour of restructuring plan. Dell to sell another $1.2bn Dell stock. Metaplanet buys another 107 BTC.Grayscale opens decentralised AI fund to investors. Robinhood allows crypto transfer in EU. Pollak to head Coinbase Wallet & join exec team. Gemini to close in Canada. Japan considers lower cap gains tax on crypto. Ohio bill would make it legal to pay taxes in crypto. Trump project opens whitelist to non-US users. CZ pledges to invest in blockchain companies.

entry.title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Talks Progress on Exchange's Global Regulatory Goals
entry.summary: Decrypt Reporters Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano spoke with Binance CEO Richard Teng about the crypto exchange's progress on establishing a global headquarters, improving its relationships with regulators, and expanding its global presence in the wake of founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao's jailing in the U.S.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 207 - WELCOME BACK TO THE BULL!
entry.summary: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate‚Äôs closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‚Äòare securities‚Äô.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!
entry.summary: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‚ÄòChokepoint 2.0‚Äô grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!
entry.summary: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‚Äòno crypto companies‚Äô. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!
entry.summary: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‚Äòalt season‚Äô. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‚Äòdone months ago‚Äô. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users‚Äô data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won‚Äôt serve time in jail.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO
entry.summary: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin‚Äôs now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 201 - CRYPTO FLYS AFTER FED
entry.summary: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‚Äòout of thin air‚Äô. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 200 - DONALD TRUMP RECAP
entry.summary: Bitcoin dominance rises ahead of Fed. May see short-term crash after Fed: Hayes. ETH underperformance may reverse soon: BitWise. Vitalik sings during Token 2049 appearance. SUI & FTM continue to outperform in L1s. BNB to introduce gasless stablecoin transfers. Tether market share hits 75%. Australia launches 3-year CBDC program. Russia to pay China in crypto for war supplies. USDC available for Brazil & Mexico bank transfers. We are one of the biggest users of blockchain: Dimon. Kamala may push crypto firms abroad: Nansen CEO. Dragonfly looking to raise $500m fund. Bitget users hit 45m, most growth from TON. Gensler pushed to clarify his stance on airdrops. Binance denies involvement in WazirX hack. Janus Henderson to tokenise fund. TON partners with Curve for stablecoin swaps. LINK & Fireblocks partner for stablecoin issuance. WalletConnect seat to airdrop 185m WCT tokens.

entry.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin
entry.summary: Dustin Stockton is known as the ‚ÄúGodfather of Political Finance‚Äù but he wasn‚Äôt always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 199 - SO ABOUT YESTERDAY
entry.summary: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ETH dominance falls to 14%, lowest level in 3 years. AI coins strong as Nvidia & chip optimism returns. SWIFT set to build infrastructure for RWA trading. Coinbase launches wrapped Bitcoin product. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. Casino tokens rise, RLB up 100% in 2 weeks. Ape Punk sells in ‚Äòheist‚Äô for 10ETH. XCOPY editions & 1/1s see high sales. Fantasy Top trading volume continues to grow. Trump family set to launch crypto project Monday.

entry.title: Why CEO Jack Lu Is Pushing Magic Eden Beyond NFTs
entry.summary: Magic Eden's grip on the NFT market has been cemented by a multi-chain approach under co-founder and CEO Jack Lu. Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.
